description: Try our easy to follow Ham & Gruyere Galette recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Ham,High fibre,High protein,Low sugar
name: Ham & Gruyere Galette Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 frozen readyrolled puff pastry, see tip
300g shaved Bertocchi Australian Double Smoked Ham off the Bone

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Cut a 23cm round from each pastry sheet. On one round, score lightly around the edge (without cutting through), leaving a 3cm border. Place over remaining pastry round and place onto baking tray.
Spread relish on pastry within border. Top with onethird of the cheese, 200g ham and remaining cheese. Brush oil onto border and bake for 35 minutes or until pastry is golden and crisp.
Sprinkle galette with parsley. Serve immediately with green salad topped with remaining ham and crusty bread on the side.
